name: Sacramento By Night
description:
Prowl the streets of Sacramento while you hunt down the Prince of Sacramento so you can Claim Praxis. Be careful you will have to worry about feeding, hunting, and staying away from the beast as you climb your way to the top.

This game was made for the 2021 Vampire Game Jam hosted by World of Darkness.

I was not able to get everything I wanted in, who does, so stick to Coterie Backgrounds, Skills, and Attributes while leveling up.

This is my first game release so please let me know of any issue and I hope you have fun.

Controls: Character Button on the top Left opens your character sheet, notifications and alerts will show up in the bottom left, Healing, End Turn, Escape Back to Have, and Sleep are in the bottom right.

The Map markers are places to visit with information about Sacramento. They will also show information about what is going on in that area.

The Anarch Movement likes to hide under your nose so be sure to check behind the map details window.
